c74object.name: seq.snap~

attribute.name: auto
attribute.digest: When enabled, value changes to the first inlet can be sampled and output automatically.

attribute.name: quantize
attribute.digest: When enabled, the signal at the first inlet will be rounded to the nearest whole number.

attribute.name: autointerval
attribute.digest: When auto is enabled, sets the minimum amount of time in milliseconds between sampling events.

c74object.description: Converts signals to floating points numbers. Sampling can be triggered automatically upon changes to the signal value or using an external impulse.
